text: The men's K-2 500 metres competition at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Szeged took place at the Olympic Centre of Szeged. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Thursday 22 August 2019 || 12:25 || Heats |- | Friday 23 August 2019 || 12:21 || Semifinals |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 24 August 2019 || 09:37 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 12:48 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the A final. The next six fastest boats in each heat advanced to the semifinals. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Kayakers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 1 | align="left"|Stanislau Daineka Dzmitry Natynchyk | align="left"| | 1:26.75 | |-bgcolor=ddffdd | 2 | align="left"|Pelayo Roza Pedro Vázquez | align="left"| | 1:31.49 | |-bgcolor=ddffdd | 3 | align="left"|Pierrick Bayle Aurélien Le Gall | align="left"| | 1:32.63 | |-bgcolor=ddffdd | 4 | align="left"|Dmytro Bespalko Vitalii Brezitskyi | align="left"| | 1:33.23 | |-bgcolor=ddffdd | 5 | align="left"|Gwon Gihong An Gilnam | align="left"| | 1:36.57 | |-bgcolor=ddffdd | 6 | align="left"|Linus Bolzern Maurus Pfalzgraf | align="left"| | 1:37.71 | |-bgcolor=ddffdd | 7 | align="left"|Sharma Ajatsatru Jetli Singh Ningthoujam | align="left"| | 1:43.56 | |- | 8 | align="left"|Brilend Chutra Idealj Leshi | align="left"| | 1:57.68 | |- | – | align="left"|Ahmed Sameer Jumaah Faris Sulaiman A.
